WorkItem.Description: No matter what index added items have, they are always added to the end of current nodes' children collection. So, if you bind hierarchialitemssource property of treeviewitem template to observable collection and then insert item, for example, at the beginning, the new treeview node will still be added to the end of parents nodes collection.
WorkItem.Summary: When bound to ObservableCollection, always adds items to the end of the node children collection
